name: DimensionalWarp
description:
Game made as part of the Mix and Game Jam Game jam...

Basically, move through the randomly generated levels, defeat bosses and steal their abilities coming from various different games.

SuperHot is the default ability.

Killing a portal boss replaces that with portal guns.

And killing a teleporting boss replaces that with teleporting missiles.

We had a tracer one nearly ready but we didn't have time :(
